description.value:
Trigger An ally within 30 feet would become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained]

Effect You call out a quick reminder to your ally about a special move you'd suggested to them at some point in the past, allowing the ally to avoid the triggering effect completely.
